title: Koch Foods Inc. Recalls Beef Products Due to Possible Foreign Matter Contamination
summary: WASHINGTON, April 11, 2018 Koch Foods, Inc., a Fairfield, Ohio establishment, is recalling approximately 119,480 pounds of beef rib-shaped patty products that may be contaminated with extraneous materials, specifically thin blue plastic pieces, the U.S. Department of Agricultures Food Safety and Inspection Service (FSIS) announced...
